nodes.text: Vir Vur were four-legged creatures often found roaming around Rori. They were known to be trained by creature handlers to do many tricks.

Vir Vurs were creatures in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. For many years, Vir Vurs sometimes spawned with the incorrect name "Vir Vir". This was corrected with Game Update 17 in June 2010.
